properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , DOG_NO , DOG_NAME , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN DOG USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT DOG_NO , MEMBER_NO , DOG_NAME , DOG_VALUE , DOG_AGE , DOG_GENDER , DOG_VACCINE , DOG_SIGNIFICANT FROM DOG JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, D.* FROM(SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , DOG_NO , DOG_NAME , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN DOG USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC) D) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM(SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_DESC , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_STOCK , PRODUCT_UPDATE , PRODUCT_DISCOUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC)P) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.* FROM(SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_STOCK , PRODUCT_UPDATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_STOCK = 0 ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO ASC)P) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS YM FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS NM FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, p.* FROM(SELECT ORDER_NO , MEMBER_NO , PRODUCT_NO , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_DATE , ORDER_COUNT , PAYMENT_NO , ORDER_STATUS FROM P_ORDER WHERE ORDER_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC) p) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
